name: Draft
description: The invoice has been created but not yet completed or sent.

name: Sent
description: The invoice has been sent to the client but not yet paid.

name: Paid
description: The invoice has been fully settled by the client.

name: Partially paid
description: Only part of the invoice amount has been paid.

name: Overdue
description: The payment due date has passed, and the invoice is still unpaid.

name: Canceled
description: The invoice has been voided and is no longer valid.

name: Rejected
description: The client has disputed or rejected the invoice.

name: Refunded
description: The invoice amount has been reimbursed to the client.

name: Under review
description: The invoice is being checked for corrections or approvals.

name: Archived
description: The invoice has been closed and stored for future reference.
